sentences.en: All three babies were born with an incurable heart condition.
sentences.cn: 三个婴儿都有不可治瘉的先天性心脏病.
不可改变的乐观主义者

sentences.en: He has an incurable and widespread nepotism.
sentences.cn: 他们有不可救药的,到处蔓延的裙带主义.

sentences.en: He is suffering from an incurable disease.
He is suffering from an incurable skin disease.
sentences.cn: 他患有无法根治的皮肤病。

sentences.en: Her danger lay , as she knew, in her old incurable dread of discomfort and poverty.
sentences.cn: 她知道, 真正的危机存在于自己害怕艰苦和贫穷.

sentences.en: If you dug up an old medical book from the sixties, it would tell you that childhood leukemia is incurable.
sentences.cn: 如果找一本20世纪60年代的旧医学书出来的话，它会告诉你儿童白血病是不治之症。

sentences.en: Of anorectal diseases in the treatment of incurable diseases are unique.
sentences.cn: 对肛肠疾病中的疑难杂症的治疗有独到之处.

sentences.en: Poor old William is an incurable romantic.
sentences.cn: 可怜的老威廉是个无可救药的浪漫主义者。

sentences.en: The cat was evidently incurable and the old couple had to get it put away.
sentences.cn: 这只猫的病显然没法治好了,老夫妇只得请人把它杀掉.

sentences.en: The king's incurable indecisiveness caused turmoil in his court.
sentences.cn: 国王不可救药的优柔寡断导致了其王宫中的骚乱.

sentences.en: The same incurable conflict of priest hoods scars all the temple ruins of Egypt.
sentences.cn: 同样也无法调和的僧侣界之间的冲突,在埃及庙宇的废墟上处处留有创痕.

sentences.en: There is an incurable tendency in the human mind to overload things with personal significance.
sentences.cn: 人类的天性中有一种无法克服的倾向,就是要使每件东西都担负上私人的意义.

sentences.en: This new drug works wonders on formerly incurable diseases.
sentences.cn: 这种新药对以前的不治之症有特效.

sentences.en: Without the treatment , our condition could easily become incurable.
sentences.cn: 如不这么办, 我们的条件就可能变得不可收拾.

sentences.en: You are either very young or an incurable optimist.
sentences.cn: 你要么非常年轻，要么是个不可救药的乐天派。

trans.tran_cn: 无法治愈的，无法改变的，不能矫正的
